title: Elo Decay (not happening to me)?
body:
I haven't played a ranked game over 2 months or so (1 month or so for PVP) and my 'elo' is staying at 54, B4 where I left it...aren't I supposed to decay or something over a month?

*#Kassawin* {{champion:38}}

replies.body: Are you serious? For one, you don't decay in pre-season, and two, you don't decay below plat.

> Are you serious? For one, you don't decay in pre-season, and two, you don't decay below plat.

Lol sorry, I had no idea about elo decay stuff because I hardly played ranked so all I know was that there "was an elo decay"...I don't know at what rate it goes by either so yeah :P

they changed it so no one decays until Platinum now. Making it easier to climb for people who take long breaks.

#NoMoreExcuses

> they changed it so no one decays until Platinum now. Making it easier to climb for people who take long breaks.

Oh, I see, cheers~
Pretty sure bronze didn't decay before those changes though...
No they didn't cause there's nothing to decay down to.
Don't worry Paper V is the codename given to bronze 5, 0 LP by riot.
